metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31102 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Ppmd7.c in 7-Zip before 23.00 allows an integer underflow and invalid readoperation via a crafted 7Z archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

7zip - 23.01+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 7zip package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '23.01+dfsg-3').
